title: Diamond Team Looking For Plat 2 + Mid Laner (Sydney Only)
body:
Our Mid Laner has Recently just left because of other commitments
So auRa eSports Sydney is looking for a new mid laner


Ign:
Age:
Role:
Top 5 Champions:
What you bring to a team:
Location in Sydney:

Please fill out the above and leave below or add me in game, auRa Snakeboy1

Cheers

replies.body:
I used to play in different accounts just for fun in overseas , and my ping was over 300 , Hyper Dynamic , Hyper Psycho , Hyper Eraser in EU , Now i transfered to Oceania , I'm 25 years old (Master in engineering) , My main roles are mid( Swain , Malzahar, Kata, Lux , Morgana , fiddle , xerath , Anivia ,...) and Support ( Leona , Janna , Lulu , Thresh , Alistar , blitz , fiddle , Nautilus , nidalee , ...) ,. I have about 4 years experience in this game and before i used to play dota and other games .In mid lane, im very patient and just focus on farming and ganking lanes , and i have 'Must Win' spirit, In support role i design the strategy of the team and control every vital points of the map by warding and baiting.  I live in west sydney , i would love to prove my gaming skill in 1vs1 if u want to test me , but actualy i need your team information too, 0452595112 Call me if needed.

 Regards

Ign: whitepumah

Age: 21

Role: mid

Top 5 Champions: veigar, leblanc, zilean, lux, ziggs

What you bring to a team: I can bring a serious game focused attitude even outside of game, as well as non meta team comps and strategies.

Location in Sydney: Blacktown
